article_title: Changes in how doctors get paid
article_text:
By Adam Orr

Posted Jul. 4, 2015 at 2:10 PM

Updated Jul 6, 2015 at 11:29 AM

article_metadata.description: After nearly 30 years as a primary care physician, Cherryville's Dr. Thomas White was tired of being told by someone else how he should practice medicine.
article_metadata.author: Adam Orr
